basics.name: Taitusi Vadei
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

volunteer.summary: Contributed to research, data analysis, and project coordination efforts that directly impact the social, economic, and environmental well-being of Pacific Island communities.
highlights: Collaborating with local communities and organizations to understand their needs and perspectives
Assisting in the planning, execution, and evaluation of projects and initiatives aimed at promoting sustainable development in the Pacific Islands

awards.title: United States South Pacific Scholarship Program
awards.summary: The USSP offers fully funded scholarships to students from Pacific Island nations to pursue undergraduate or graduate (master's or doctoral) degree programs at universities and colleges in the United States.

awards.title: Pacific Academic Excellence Award
awards.summary: USP provides full funded scholarships for Bachelor Studies at their Fiji Laucala campus to students who achieved the highest GPA in Foundation studies across all of their campuses in the region.
